title: Animal Health (Veterinary Services Fees) Regulations, 2018
content:
29thMarch,2018 Statutory Instruments 379
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.22 OF2018
The Animal Health Act, 2010
(ActNo.27of2010)
The Animal Health (Veterinary Services Fees)
Regulations, 2018
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsection80oftheAnimal
HealthAct,2010thefollowingRegulationsaremade:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Animal Health Title
(VeterinaryServicesFees)Regulations,2018.
2. ThefeessetoutintheScheduleareapplicablefeesforthe Fees
mattersspecifiedinthatSchedule.
3. TheAnimalHealth(VeterinaryServicesFees)Regulations, Revocation
2016,arerevoked. ofSI
No.105of
2016
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK16.00 each
380 StatutoryInstruments 29thMarch,2018
SCHEDULE
(Paragraph2)
PRESCRIBEDFEES
A VETERINARYCLINICALSERVICES FeesUnits
1. Consultations(verbaldiscussionsonly) 166.67
2. Farmcallsandvisits-forfirsthours 416.67
3. Foreachsubsequenthourorpartthereof 333.33

forlivestockand10,000forbirds 166.67

4. Smallanimals(dogs,catsandsmallsizespecies)per5animals 500.00
5. Gameanimalsper10animals 3,333
Poultry

1,001to20,000birds 333.33

7thMarch,2018
